properties.entry:
SELECT BSNS_CLS ,RCIV_DATE ,RCIV_SEQ_NUM ,COVR_CLS ,DAM_ORDER ,TARGT_NAME ,CAR_NAME ,FCTR_NAME ,DEPT_CODE ,TEAM_CODE ,CLERK_NO ,DAM_DEG ,INJR_CLS ,RPSN_GBHA ,DSCN_FLT_RATE ,COVR_RANGE ,DAM_STF_STS ,TER_CLS ,XMP_CANC_DATE ,XMP_CODE ,OS_INS_MNY ,ACC_DTMN_AMT ,LAST_AGREE_YN ,RLST_REPL_PATH_CLS FROM ( SELECT PCAL01.BSNS_CLS ,PCAL01.RCIV_DATE ,PCAL01.RCIV_SEQ_NUM ,CASE PCAL01.COVR_CLS WHEN '10' THEN '3' WHEN '30' THEN '4' ELSE '5' END AS COVRORDER ,PCAL01.COVR_CLS ,PCAL01.DAM_ORDER ,PCAC01.ACCD_PTY_NAME AS TARGT_NAME ,'' AS CAR_NAME ,PCAC01.HPTL_NAME AS FCTR_NAME ,PCAL01.DEPT_CODE ,PCAL01.TEAM_CODE ,PCAL01.CLERK_NO ,'' AS DAM_DEG ,COALESCE(SV00.INJR_CLS, '') INJR_CLS ,COALESCE(SV12.RPSN_GBHA, '') RPSN_GBHA ,VALUE(SV02.DSCN_FLT_RATE, 0) AS DSCN_FLT_RATE ,PCAC01.COVR_RANGE ,PCAL01.DAM_STF_STS ,RQ14TB.TER_CLS ,RQ14TB.XMP_CANC_DATE ,RQ14TB.XMP_CODE ,RQ00.OS_INS_MNY ,RQ00.ACC_DTMN_AMT ,(COALESCE(RQ07.LAST_AGREE_YN, '')) AS LAST_AGREE_YN ,(COALESCE(RQ07.RLST_REPL_PATH_CLS, '')) AS RLST_REPL_PATH_CLS FROM PCAL01TB PCAL01 LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT TER_CLS, XMP_CANC_DATE ,XMP_CODE FROM PCRQ14TB RQ14TB WHERE RQ14TB.BSNS_CLS = PCAL01.BSNS_CLS AND RQ14TB.RCIV_DATE = PCAL01.RCIV_DATE AND RQ14TB.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAL01.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND RQ14TB.COVR_CLS = PCAL01.COVR_CLS AND RQ14TB.DAM_ORDER = PCAL01.DAM_ORDER AND RQ14TB.XMP_ORD_NUM = (SELECT MAX(XMP_ORD_NUM) FROM PCRQ14TB RQ14TB WHERE RQ14TB.BSNS_CLS = PCAL01.BSNS_CLS AND RQ14TB.RCIV_DATE = PCAL01.RCIV_DATE AND RQ14TB.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAL01.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND RQ14TB.COVR_CLS = PCAL01.COVR_CLS AND RQ14TB.DAM_ORDER = PCAL01.DAM_ORDER) ) RQ14TB ON 1=1
LEFT OUTER JOIN PCRQ00TB RQ00 ON RQ00.FK_BSNS_CLS = PCAL01.BSNS_CLS AND RQ00.FK_RCIV_DATE = PCAL01.RCIV_DATE AND RQ00.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAL01.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND RQ00.FK_SEQ_NUM = 1 AND RQ00.COVR_CLS = PCAL01.COVR_CLS AND RQ00.DAM_ORDER = PCAL01.DAM_ORDER
, PCAC01TB PCAC01
LEFT OUTER JOIN PCSV00TB SV00 ON SV00.FK_BSNS_CLS = PCAC01.FK_BSNS_CLS AND SV00.FK_RCIV_DATE = PCAC01.FK_RCIV_DATE AND SV00.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAC01.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND SV00.PTY_ID = PCAC01.PTY_ID AND SV00.INJURED_YN = '1'
LEFT OUTER JOIN PCSV02TB SV02 ON SV02.FK_BSNS_CLS = SV00.FK_BSNS_CLS AND SV02.FK_RCIV_DATE = SV00.FK_RCIV_DATE AND SV02.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = SV00.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND SV02.FK_PTY_ID = SV00.PTY_ID AND SV02.SVY_CLS = '2' AND SV02.APP_END_DATE = '9999-12-31'
LEFT OUTER JOIN PCSV12TB SV12 ON SV12.FK_BSNS_CLS = SV00.FK_BSNS_CLS AND SV12.FK_RCIV_DATE = SV00.FK_RCIV_DATE AND SV12.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = SV00.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND SV12.FK_PTY_ID = SV00.PTY_ID AND SV12.END_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND SV12.GBHA_CLS = '1'
LEFT OUTER JOIN pcrq07tb RQ07 ON RQ07.FK_BSNS_CLS = PCAC01.FK_BSNS_CLS AND RQ07.FK_RCIV_DATE = PCAC01.FK_RCIV_DATE AND RQ07.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAC01.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND RQ07.FK_COVR_CLS = PCAC01.COVR_CLS AND RQ07.FK_DAM_ORDER = PCAC01.DAM_ORDER AND RQ07.AGREE_CLS = '2' AND RQ07.APPL_END_DATE = '9999-12-31'
, PCAC00TB PCAC00 WHERE PCAL01.BSNS_CLS = #bsnsCls# AND PCAL01.RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND PCAL01.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = #rcivSeqNum# AND PCAL01.PCAC01_PCAC02_CLS = '1' AND PCAL01.DAM_CLS = '1' AND PCAL01.DAM_STF_STS IN ('1','2') AND PCAL01.BSNS_CLS = PCAC01.FK_BSNS_CLS AND PCAL01.RCIV_DATE = PCAC01.FK_RCIV_DATE AND PCAL01.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAC01.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND PCAL01.PCAC01_PCAC02_SEQ = PCAC01.SEQ_NUM AND PCAC00.BSNS_CLS = PCAL01.BSNS_CLS AND PCAC00.RCIV_DATE = PCAL01.RCIV_DATE AND PCAC00.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAL01.RCIV_SEQ_NUM UNION ALL SELECT PCAC00.BSNS_CLS ,PCAC00.RCIV_DATE ,PCAC00.RCIV_SEQ_NUM ,CASE PCAC02.COVR_CLS WHEN '40' THEN '1' ELSE '2' END AS COVRORDER ,PCAC02.COVR_CLS ,PCAC02.DAM_ORDER ,(CASE PCAC02.PDLB_CLS WHEN '10' THEN PCAC02.CAR_NO ELSE PCAC02.DAM_OBJ_NAME END) AS TARGT_NAME ,PCAC02.DAM_OBJ_NAME AS CAR_NAME ,COALESCE((SELECT FCTR_NAME FROM PCSV51TB WHERE FK_BSNS_CLS = PCAC02.FK_BSNS_CLS AND FK_RCIV_DATE = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_DATE AND FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND FK_SEQ_NUM = PCAC02.SEQ_NUM AND INPUT_CLS = '2' AND APP_END_DATE = '9999-12-31') ,(SELECT FCTR_NAME FROM PCSV51TB WHERE FK_BSNS_CLS = PCAC02.FK_BSNS_CLS AND FK_RCIV_DATE = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_DATE AND FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND FK_SEQ_NUM = PCAC02.SEQ_NUM AND INPUT_CLS = '1' AND APP_END_DATE = '9999-12-31') ) AS FCTR_NAME ,PCAL01.DEPT_CODE ,PCAL01.TEAM_CODE ,PCAL01.CLERK_NO ,PCAC02.DAM_DEG ,'' INJR_CLS ,'' RPSN_GBHA ,CASE PCAC02.COVR_CLS WHEN '20' THEN PCAC02.FLT_RATE ELSE COALESCE(( SELECT DSCN_FLT_RATE FROM PCSV02TB WHERE FK_BSNS_CLS = PCAC02.FK_BSNS_CLS AND FK_RCIV_DATE = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_DATE AND FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND SVY_CLS = '1' AND APP_END_DATE = '9999-12-31' ),0) END AS DSCN_FLT_RATE , '' COVR_RANGE ,PCAL01.DAM_STF_STS ,RQ14TB.TER_CLS ,RQ14TB.XMP_CANC_DATE ,RQ14TB.XMP_CODE ,RQ00.OS_INS_MNY ,RQ00.ACC_DTMN_AMT ,(COALESCE(RQ07.LAST_AGREE_YN, '')) AS LAST_AGREE_YN ,(COALESCE(RQ07.RLST_REPL_PATH_CLS, '')) AS RLST_REPL_PATH_CLS FROM PCAC00TB PCAC00 , PCAC02TB PCAC02 LEFT OUTER JOIN PCAL01TB PCAL01 ON PCAL01.BSNS_CLS = PCAC02.FK_BSNS_CLS AND PCAL01.RCIV_DATE = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_DATE AND PCAL01.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND PCAL01.PCAC01_PCAC02_CLS = '2' AND PCAL01.DAM_CLS = '1' AND PCAL01.DAM_STF_STS IN ('1','2') AND PCAL01.PCAC01_PCAC02_SEQ = PCAC02.SEQ_NUM
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT TER_CLS, XMP_CANC_DATE, XMP_CODE FROM PCRQ14TB RQ14TB WHERE RQ14TB.BSNS_CLS = PCAC02.FK_BSNS_CLS AND RQ14TB.RCIV_DATE = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_DATE AND RQ14TB.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND RQ14TB.COVR_CLS = PCAC02.COVR_CLS AND RQ14TB.DAM_ORDER = PCAC02.DAM_ORDER AND RQ14TB.XMP_ORD_NUM = (SELECT MAX(XMP_ORD_NUM) FROM PCRQ14TB RQ14TB WHERE RQ14TB.BSNS_CLS = PCAC02.FK_BSNS_CLS AND RQ14TB.RCIV_DATE = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_DATE AND RQ14TB.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND RQ14TB.COVR_CLS = PCAC02.COVR_CLS AND RQ14TB.DAM_ORDER = PCAC02.DAM_ORDER) ) RQ14TB ON 1=1
LEFT OUTER JOIN PCRQ00TB RQ00 ON RQ00.FK_BSNS_CLS = PCAC02.FK_BSNS_CLS AND RQ00.FK_RCIV_DATE = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_DATE AND RQ00.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND RQ00.FK_SEQ_NUM = 1 AND RQ00.COVR_CLS = PCAC02.COVR_CLS AND RQ00.DAM_ORDER = PCAC02.DAM_ORDER
LEFT OUTER JOIN pcrq07tb RQ07 ON RQ07.FK_BSNS_CLS = PCAC02.FK_BSNS_CLS AND RQ07.FK_RCIV_DATE = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_DATE AND RQ07.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAC02.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND RQ07.FK_COVR_CLS = PCAC02.COVR_CLS AND RQ07.FK_DAM_ORDER = PCAC02.DAM_ORDER AND RQ07.AGREE_CLS = '3' AND RQ07.APPL_END_DATE = '9999-12-31' WHERE PCAC00.BSNS_CLS = #bsnsCls# AND PCAC00.RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND PCAC00.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = #rcivSeqNum# AND PCAC02.FK_BSNS_CLS = PCAC00.BSNS_CLS AND PCAC02.FK_RCIV_DATE = PCAC00.RCIV_DATE AND PCAC02.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PCAC00.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND PCAC02.COVR_CLS IN ('20','40') ) ORDER BY COVRORDER, DAM_ORDER OPTIMIZE FOR 1 ROW WITH UR

SELECT hos.SEQ_NUM, hos.HPTL_NM, hos.MAJ_DIAG_SBJT, hos.DIAG_CLS, hos.DIAG_START_DATE, hos.DIAG_END_DATE, hos.REAL_DIAG_DT_CNT, c.CLERK_NO DAMDANG_CLERK, d.CLERK_NAME DAMDANG_CLERK_NM, hos.DIAG_PAPR_NO, COALESCE(f.INJR_GBHA,'') INJR_GBHA, COALESCE(f.INJR_DIAG_NAME,'') INJR_DIAG_NAME, COALESCE(g.DIAG_PERI,0) DIAG_PERI, COALESCE(g.DIAG_END_DATE,'0001-01-01') CURE_END_DATE, hos.MAJ_DIAG_CONT, rtrim(hos.HPTL_PTY_ID) HPTL_PTY_ID FROM ( SELECT a.SEQ_NUM, a.HPTL_CD, a.MAJ_DIAG_SBJT, a.HPTL_NM, b.FK_PTY_ID HS_PTY_ID, a.DIAG_CLS, a.DIAG_START_DATE, a.DIAG_END_DATE, a.REAL_DIAG_DT_CNT, a.HSPTL_ABSNC_DAYS, a.SKRM_NO, a.DIAG_PAPR_NO, a.INPUT_CLERK, e.CLERK_NAME, a.FK_BSNS_CLS, a.FK_RCIV_DATE, a.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM, a.FK_PTY_ID, a.MAJ_DIAG_CONT, a.HPTL_PTY_ID FROM PCSV10TB a
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT FK_PTY_ID ,B.APPL_TER_DATE FROM GCCE20TB B WHERE B.FK_PTY_ID = a.HPTL_PTY_ID AND B.SEQ_NUM = (select max(SEQ_NUM) from GCCE20TB F WHERE F.FK_PTY_ID = a.HPTL_PTY_ID)) B ON 1=1 AND B.APPL_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' LEFT OUTER JOIN STAFF0TB e ON a.INPUT_CLERK = e.CLERK_NO WHERE a.FK_BSNS_CLS = #bsnsCls# AND a.FK_RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND a.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = #rcivSeqNum# AND a.FK_PTY_ID = #ptyId# ) hos
LEFT OUTER JOIN PCAS08TB c ON hos.HS_PTY_ID = c.PTY_ID AND WORK_CLS = '2' AND REL_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' LEFT OUTER JOIN STAFF0TB d ON c.CLERK_NO = d.CLERK_NO
LEFT OUTER JOIN PCSV20TB f ON hos.FK_BSNS_CLS = f.FK_BSNS_CLS AND hos.FK_RCIV_DATE = f.FK_RCIV_DATE AND hos.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = f.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND hos.FK_PTY_ID = f.FK_PTY_ID AND hos.DIAG_PAPR_NO = f.FK_DIAG_PAPR_NO AND f.END_DATE = '9999-12-31' LEFT OUTER JOIN PCSV19TB g ON hos.FK_BSNS_CLS = g.FK_BSNS_CLS AND hos.FK_RCIV_DATE = g.FK_RCIV_DATE AND hos.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = g.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND hos.FK_PTY_ID = g.FK_PTY_ID AND hos.DIAG_PAPR_NO = g.DIAG_PAPR_NO OPTIMIZE FOR 1 ROW WITH UR

SELECT T.rciv_date ,T.rciv_seq_num ,T.covr_cls ,T.dam_order ,T.accd_cls ,T.pty_name ,T.hptl_name ,T.rpsn_gbha ,T.acc_dtmn_amt ,T.os_ins_mny ,T.clerk_name ,T.pass_Day ,T.carry_value FROM (SELECT al01.rciv_date ,al01.rciv_seq_num ,al01.covr_cls ,al01.dam_order ,CASE WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '10' THEN '책임' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '11' THEN 'Ｍ／Ｔ' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '12' THEN '비Ｍ／Ｔ' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '20' THEN '임의' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '21' THEN '타차운전' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '30' THEN '외화표시' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '40' THEN '취급업자' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '50' THEN '운전자' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '60' THEN '정부보장' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '13' THEN '책임임의' ELSE '' END accd_cls ,COALESCE(ac01.accd_pty_name ,'') pty_name ,VALUE( (SELECT sv10.hptl_nm FROM pcsv10tb sv10 WHERE sv10.fk_bsns_cls = ac01.fk_bsns_cls AND sv10.fk_rciv_date = ac01.fk_rciv_date AND sv10.fk_rciv_seq_num = ac01.fk_rciv_seq_num AND sv10.fk_pty_id = ac01.pty_id AND sv10.seq_num = (SELECT max(sv10.seq_num) FROM pcsv10tb sv10 WHERE sv10.fk_bsns_cls = ac01.fk_bsns_cls AND sv10.fk_rciv_date = ac01.fk_rciv_date AND sv10.fk_rciv_seq_num = ac01.fk_rciv_seq_num AND sv10.fk_pty_id = ac01.pty_id) ), '') hptl_name ,sv12.rpsn_gbha ,rq00.acc_dtmn_amt ,rq00.os_ins_mny ,COALESCE((SELECT clerk_name FROM staff0tb where clerk_no = al01.clerk_no), '') clerk_name ,DAYS(current_date) - DAYS(ac00.accd_date) pass_Day ,COALESCE(lg12.carry_value, '') carry_value FROM pcal01tb al01 LEFT OUTER JOIN pclg12tb lg12 ON lg12.fk_bsns_cls = al01.bsns_cls AND lg12.fk_rciv_date = al01.rciv_date AND lg12.fk_rciv_seq_num = al01.rciv_seq_num AND lg12.fk_agt_seq_num = 1 AND lg12.fk_covr_cls = al01.covr_cls AND lg12.fk_dam_order = al01.dam_order AND lg12.fk_svy_req_cls = '03' AND lg12.fk_seq_num = 1 AND lg12.seq_num = 1 ,pcac00tb ac00 ,pcrq00tb rq00 ,pcac01tb ac01 ,pcsv12tb sv12 WHERE al01.clerk_no = #clerkNo# AND al01.chrg_dtbn_ter_date = '9999-12-31' AND al01.dam_stf_sts = '1' AND al01.dam_cls = '1' AND al01.pcac01_pcac02_cls = '1' AND al01.bsns_cls = '1' AND al01.covr_cls = '10'
AND ac00.bsns_cls = al01.bsns_cls AND ac00.rciv_date = al01.rciv_date AND ac00.rciv_seq_num = al01.rciv_seq_num AND ac00.accd_cls NOT IN ('10','60') AND ac00.coop_unlw_act <> '2'
AND rq00.fk_bsns_cls = al01.bsns_cls AND rq00.fk_rciv_date = al01.rciv_date AND rq00.fk_rciv_seq_num = al01.rciv_seq_num AND rq00.fk_seq_num = 1 AND rq00.covr_cls = al01.covr_cls AND rq00.dam_order = al01.dam_order
AND ac01.fk_bsns_cls = al01.bsns_cls AND ac01.fk_rciv_date = al01.rciv_date AND ac01.fk_rciv_seq_num = al01.rciv_seq_num AND ac01.agrm_seq = 1 AND ac01.covr_cls = al01.covr_cls AND ac01.dam_order = al01.dam_order AND ac01.pty_cls = '2'
AND sv12.fk_bsns_cls = al01.bsns_cls AND sv12.fk_rciv_date = al01.rciv_date AND sv12.fk_rciv_seq_num = al01.rciv_seq_num AND sv12.fk_pty_id = ac01.pty_id AND sv12.gbha_cls = '1' AND sv12.end_date = '9999-12-31'
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM pcpa03tb pa03 WHERE pa03.fk_bsns_cls = al01.bsns_cls AND pa03.fk_rciv_date = al01.rciv_date AND pa03.fk_rciv_seq_num = al01.rciv_seq_num AND pa03.fk_agt_seq_num = 1 AND pa03.fk_covr_cls = al01.covr_cls AND pa03.fk_dam_order = al01.dam_order AND pa03.pay_type = '01')
AND ((DAYS($baseDate$) - DAYS(ac00.accd_date) > 151 AND sv12.rpsn_gbha between '0100' and '0199') OR (DAYS($baseDate$) - DAYS(ac00.accd_date) > 91 AND sv12.rpsn_gbha between '0200' and '0399') OR (DAYS($baseDate$) - DAYS(ac00.accd_date) > 61 AND sv12.rpsn_gbha between '0400' and '0699')) ) T WHERE T.carry_value BETWEEN #fromCarryValue# AND #toCarryValue# AND T.rciv_date >= #rcivDate# AND ((T.rciv_date > #rcivDate#) OR (T.rciv_date = #rcivDate# AND T.rciv_seq_num >= #rcivSeqNum#) OR (T.rciv_date = #rcivDate# AND T.rciv_seq_num = #rcivSeqNum# AND T.covr_cls >= #covrCls#) OR (T.rciv_date = #rcivDate# AND T.rciv_seq_num = #rcivSeqNum# AND T.covr_cls = #covrCls# AND T.dam_order >= #damOrder# )) ORDER BY T.rciv_date ,T.rciv_seq_num ,T.covr_cls ,T.dam_order FETCH FIRST 15 ROWS ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 1 ROW FOR FETCH ONLY

SELECT T.rciv_date ,T.rciv_seq_num ,T.covr_cls ,T.dam_order ,T.accd_cls ,T.pty_name ,T.hptl_name ,T.rpsn_gbha ,T.acc_dtmn_amt ,T.os_ins_mny ,T.clerk_name ,T.pass_Day ,T.carry_value FROM (SELECT al01.rciv_date ,al01.rciv_seq_num ,al01.covr_cls ,al01.dam_order ,CASE WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '10' THEN '책임' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '11' THEN 'Ｍ／Ｔ' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '12' THEN '비Ｍ／Ｔ' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '20' THEN '임의' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '21' THEN '타차운전' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '30' THEN '외화표시' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '40' THEN '취급업자' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '50' THEN '운전자' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '60' THEN '정부보장' WHEN ac00.accd_cls = '13' THEN '책임임의' ELSE '' END accd_cls ,COALESCE(ac01.accd_pty_name ,'') pty_name ,VALUE( (SELECT sv10.hptl_nm FROM pcsv10tb sv10 WHERE sv10.fk_bsns_cls = ac01.fk_bsns_cls AND sv10.fk_rciv_date = ac01.fk_rciv_date AND sv10.fk_rciv_seq_num = ac01.fk_rciv_seq_num AND sv10.fk_pty_id = ac01.pty_id AND sv10.seq_num = (SELECT max(sv10.seq_num) FROM pcsv10tb sv10 WHERE sv10.fk_bsns_cls = ac01.fk_bsns_cls AND sv10.fk_rciv_date = ac01.fk_rciv_date AND sv10.fk_rciv_seq_num = ac01.fk_rciv_seq_num AND sv10.fk_pty_id = ac01.pty_id) ), '') hptl_name ,sv12.rpsn_gbha ,rq00.acc_dtmn_amt ,rq00.os_ins_mny ,COALESCE((SELECT clerk_name FROM staff0tb where clerk_no = al01.clerk_no), '') clerk_name ,DAYS(current_date) - DAYS(ac00.accd_date) pass_Day ,COALESCE(lg12.carry_value, '') carry_value FROM pcal01tb al01 LEFT OUTER JOIN pclg12tb lg12 ON lg12.fk_bsns_cls = al01.bsns_cls AND lg12.fk_rciv_date = al01.rciv_date AND lg12.fk_rciv_seq_num = al01.rciv_seq_num AND lg12.fk_agt_seq_num = 1 AND lg12.fk_covr_cls = al01.covr_cls AND lg12.fk_dam_order = al01.dam_order AND lg12.fk_svy_req_cls = '03' AND lg12.fk_seq_num = 1 AND lg12.seq_num = 1 ,pcac00tb ac00 ,pcrq00tb rq00 ,pcac01tb ac01 ,pcsv12tb sv12 WHERE al01.clerk_no = #clerkNo# AND al01.chrg_dtbn_ter_date = '9999-12-31' AND al01.dam_stf_sts = '1' AND al01.dam_cls = '1' AND al01.pcac01_pcac02_cls = '1' AND al01.bsns_cls = '1' AND al01.covr_cls = '10'
AND ac00.bsns_cls = al01.bsns_cls AND ac00.rciv_date = al01.rciv_date AND ac00.rciv_seq_num = al01.rciv_seq_num AND ac00.accd_cls NOT IN ('10','60','21') AND ac00.coop_unlw_act <> '2'
AND rq00.fk_bsns_cls = al01.bsns_cls AND rq00.fk_rciv_date = al01.rciv_date AND rq00.fk_rciv_seq_num = al01.rciv_seq_num AND rq00.fk_seq_num = 1 AND rq00.covr_cls = al01.covr_cls AND rq00.dam_order = al01.dam_order
AND ac01.fk_bsns_cls = al01.bsns_cls AND ac01.fk_rciv_date = al01.rciv_date AND ac01.fk_rciv_seq_num = al01.rciv_seq_num AND ac01.agrm_seq = 1 AND ac01.covr_cls = al01.covr_cls AND ac01.dam_order = al01.dam_order AND ac01.pty_cls = '2' AND ac01.jumin_ymd > '' AND ac01.jumin_sex > ''
AND sv12.fk_bsns_cls = al01.bsns_cls AND sv12.fk_rciv_date = al01.rciv_date AND sv12.fk_rciv_seq_num = al01.rciv_seq_num AND sv12.fk_pty_id = ac01.pty_id AND sv12.gbha_cls = '1' AND sv12.end_date = '9999-12-31'
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM pcpa03tb pa03 WHERE pa03.fk_bsns_cls = al01.bsns_cls AND pa03.fk_rciv_date = al01.rciv_date AND pa03.fk_rciv_seq_num = al01.rciv_seq_num AND pa03.fk_agt_seq_num = 1 AND pa03.fk_covr_cls = al01.covr_cls AND pa03.fk_dam_order = al01.dam_order AND pa03.pay_type = '01')
AND ((DAYS($baseDate$) - DAYS(ac00.accd_date) between 181 and 210 AND sv12.rpsn_gbha between '0100' and '0199')

AND rq00.fk_bsns_cls = al01.bsns_cls AND rq00.fk_rciv_date = al01.rciv_date AND rq00.fk_rciv_seq_num = al01.rciv_seq_num AND rq00.fk_seq_num = 1 AND rq00.covr_cls = al01.covr_cls AND rq00.dam_order = al01.dam_order

SELECT SUBSTR(DTMN,1,9) AS CLERK_NO ,TRIM(SUBSTR(DTMN,10,5)) AS DEPT_CD ,(SELECT REPLACE(CLERK_NAME,' ','') FROM STAFF0TB WHERE CLERK_NO=SUBSTR(DTMN,1,9)) AS CLERK_NAME ,(SELECT REPLACE(DEPT_NAME,' ','') FROM DEPT00TB WHERE DEPT_CD=TRIM(SUBSTR(DTMN,10,5))) AS DEPT_NAME ,(SELECT TRIM(STF_CONTACT_NO1)||TRIM(STF_CONTACT_NO2)||TRIM(STF_CONTACT_NO3)||TRIM(STF_CONTACT_NO4) FROM STAFF0TB WHERE CLERK_NO=SUBSTR(DTMN,1,9)) AS CONTACT_NO FROM ( SELECT MAX(RQ00.DTMN_CHRK_CLERK||RQ00.DTMN_CHRK_DEPT) AS DTMN FROM PCRQ00TB RQ00, PCAC00TB AC00 WHERE RQ00.FK_BSNS_CLS = #bsnsCls# AND RQ00.FK_RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND RQ00.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = #rcivSeqNum# AND RQ00.PTY_ID = #piboPtyId# AND RQ00.TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND RQ00.RFD_STS_CLS = '4' AND AC00.BSNS_CLS = RQ00.FK_BSNS_CLS AND AC00.RCIV_DATE = RQ00.FK_RCIV_DATE AND AC00.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = RQ00.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND AC00.ACD_RCV_SCRN_CLS <> 'A' HAVING MAX(RQ00.DTMN_CHRK_CLERK||RQ00.DTMN_CHRK_DEPT) is not null ) AA OPTIMIZE FOR 1 ROW WITH UR

select MAX(PRE_INFO_DTL_DATE) as date from pcps02tb where fk_bsns_cls = #bsnsCls# AND fk_rciv_date = #rcivDate# AND fk_rciv_seq_num = #rcivSeqNum# AND FK_PTY_ID = #ptyId# and FK_DAM_CLS = '10' and FK_PROC_CLS ='A0' and FK_PRE_INFO_CLS ='PR001' OPTIMIZE FOR 1 ROW WITH UR

SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS TCNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN OS01.SUBJECT_CODE IN ('CM201','CM202','CM203') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN OS01.SUBJECT_CODE IN ('CM251','CM252','CM253') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1='01' AND OS01.SUBJECT_CODE NOT IN ('CM201','CM202','CM203','CM251','CM252','CM253') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1='01' AND OS01.SUBJECT_CODE NOT IN ('CM201','CM202','CM203','CM251','CM252','CM253') AND CODE_KEY_2 = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT30 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1='01' AND OS01.SUBJECT_CODE NOT IN ('CM201','CM202','CM203','CM251','CM252','CM253') AND CODE_KEY_2 = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT31 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1='01' AND OS01.SUBJECT_CODE NOT IN ('CM201','CM202','CM203','CM251','CM252','CM253') AND CODE_KEY_2 = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT32 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1='01' AND OS01.SUBJECT_CODE NOT IN ('CM201','CM202','CM203','CM251','CM252','CM253') AND CODE_KEY_2 = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT33 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1='01' AND OS01.SUBJECT_CODE NOT IN ('CM201','CM202','CM203','CM251','CM252','CM253') AND CODE_KEY_2 = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT34 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1='03' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1='04' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1 IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT5 FROM PCOS01TB OS01 LEFT OUTER JOIN PCCA20TB B ON GRP_CODE_TYPE = '2007' AND CODE_TYPE_1 IN ('01','03','04') AND APPL_END_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND APPL_CODE = OS01.SUBJECT_CODE ,PCPA30TB PA30 LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE ( SELECT MAX(PAYED_DATE) as PAYED_DATE FROM PCAC03TB AC03E ,PCAC03TB AC03R ,PCRQ00TB RQ00R ,PCPA03TB PA03R ,PCPA04TB PA04R ,PCPA30TB PA30R ,PCAC00TB AC00R WHERE PA30.SUBJECT_CODE IN ('C4218','C4246','C4219','C4236') AND AC03E.FK_BSNS_CLS = PA30.FK_BSNS_CLS AND AC03E.FK_RCIV_DATE = PA30.FK_RCIV_DATE AND AC03E.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PA30.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND AC03E.SEQ_NUM = PA30.FK_SEQ_NUM
AND AC03R.AGRM_NO = AC03E.AGRM_NO AND AC03R.FK_BSNS_CLS = AC03E.FK_BSNS_CLS AND RQ00R.FK_BSNS_CLS = AC03R.FK_BSNS_CLS AND RQ00R.FK_RCIV_DATE = AC03R.FK_RCIV_DATE AND RQ00R.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = AC03R.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND RQ00R.FK_SEQ_NUM = AC03R.SEQ_NUM AND RQ00R.PTY_ID||'' = #piboPtyId# AND PA03R.FK_BSNS_CLS = RQ00R.FK_BSNS_CLS AND PA03R.FK_RCIV_DATE = RQ00R.FK_RCIV_DATE AND PA03R.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = RQ00R.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND PA03R.FK_AGT_SEQ_NUM = RQ00R.FK_SEQ_NUM AND PA03R.FK_COVR_CLS = RQ00R.COVR_CLS AND PA03R.FK_DAM_ORDER = RQ00R.DAM_ORDER AND PA03R.PAYED_DATE <> '0001-01-01' AND PA04R.FK_BSNS_CLS = PA03R.FK_BSNS_CLS AND PA04R.FK_RCIV_DATE = PA03R.FK_RCIV_DATE AND PA04R.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PA03R.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND PA04R.FK_AGT_SEQ_NUM = PA03R.FK_AGT_SEQ_NUM AND PA04R.FK_COVR_CLS = PA03R.FK_COVR_CLS AND PA04R.FK_DAM_ORDER = PA03R.FK_DAM_ORDER AND PA04R.FK_SEQ_NUM = PA03R.SEQ_NUM AND PA30R.FK_BSNS_CLS = PA04R.FK_BSNS_CLS AND PA30R.FK_RCIV_DATE = PA04R.FK_RCIV_DATE AND PA30R.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PA04R.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND PA30R.FK_SEQ_NUM = PA04R.FK_AGT_SEQ_NUM AND PA30R.COVR_CLS = PA04R.FK_COVR_CLS AND PA30R.DAM_ORDER = PA04R.FK_DAM_ORDER AND PA30R.MNPV_CLS = PA04R.MNPV_CLS AND PA30R.SUBJECT_CODE IN ('C4218','C4246','C4219','C4236') AND AC00R.BSNS_CLS = RQ00R.FK_BSNS_CLS AND AC00R.RCIV_DATE = RQ00R.FK_RCIV_DATE AND AC00R.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = RQ00R.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND CASE WHEN AC00R.ACCD_DATE BETWEEN (PA30.COVR_START_DATE+(YEAR((SELECT ACCD_DATE FROM PCAC00TB WHERE BSNS_CLS = PA30.FK_BSNS_CLS AND RCIV_DATE = PA30.FK_RCIV_DATE AND RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PA30.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM) - PA30.COVR_START_DATE))YEAR) AND (PA30.COVR_START_DATE+(YEAR((SELECT ACCD_DATE FROM PCAC00TB WHERE BSNS_CLS = PA30.FK_BSNS_CLS AND RCIV_DATE = PA30.FK_RCIV_DATE AND RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PA30.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM) - PA30.COVR_START_DATE)+1)YEAR - 1 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END = 1 ) Z ON 1=1 ,PCAC00TB AC00 WHERE OS01.FK_BSNS_CLS = #bsnsCls# AND OS01.FK_RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND OS01.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = #rcivSeqNum# AND OS01.FK_AGT_SEQ_NUM = #agtSeqNum# AND OS01.FK_COVR_CLS = #covrCls# AND OS01.FK_DAM_ORDER = #damOrder# AND OS01.FK_OS_RANK = (SELECT MAX(OS00.OS_RANK) FROM PCOS00TB OS00 WHERE OS00.FK_BSNS_CLS = #bsnsCls# AND OS00.FK_RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND OS00.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = #rcivSeqNum# AND OS00.FK_AGT_SEQ_NUM = #agtSeqNum# AND OS00.FK_COVR_CLS = #covrCls# AND OS00.FK_DAM_ORDER = #damOrder# ) AND OS01.FK_BSNS_CLS = PA30.FK_BSNS_CLS AND OS01.FK_RCIV_DATE = PA30.FK_RCIV_DATE AND OS01.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = PA30.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND OS01.FK_AGT_SEQ_NUM = PA30.FK_SEQ_NUM AND OS01.FK_COVR_CLS = PA30.COVR_CLS AND OS01.FK_DAM_ORDER = PA30.DAM_ORDER AND OS01.MNPV_CLS = PA30.MNPV_CLS AND OS01.SUBJECT_CODE = PA30.SUBJECT_CODE AND AC00.BSNS_CLS = OS01.FK_BSNS_CLS AND AC00.RCIV_DATE = OS01.FK_RCIV_DATE AND AC00.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = OS01.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND CASE WHEN OS01.SUBJECT_CODE IN ('C4218','C4246','C4219','C4236') THEN CASE WHEN AC00.ACCD_DATE BETWEEN (PA30.COVR_START_DATE+(YEAR(AC00.ACCD_DATE - PA30.COVR_START_DATE))YEAR) AND (PA30.COVR_START_DATE+(YEAR(AC00.ACCD_DATE - PA30.COVR_START_DATE)+1)YEAR - 1 DAY) AND COALESCE(Z.PAYED_DATE,'0001-01-01') = '0001-01-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 1 END = 1 ) AA WHERE CASE WHEN CNT5 > 0 THEN 0 WHEN TCNT <= 3 AND (CNT1+CNT2) < TCNT AND (CNT3+CNT4+CNT6) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN CNT1 > 0 AND CNT2 > 0 THEN 0 WHEN CNT30 > 1 OR CNT31> 1 OR CNT32 > 1 OR CNT33 > 1 OR CNT34 > 1 THEN 0 WHEN CNT30 > 0 AND (CNT31+CNT32+CNT33+CNT34) > 0 THEN 0 WHEN CNT31 = 0 AND CNT32 > 0 AND (CNT33+CNT34) > 0 AND (CNT1+CNT2+CNT4+CNT6) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN (CNT31+CNT32+CNT33) >= 3 OR (CNT31+CNT32+CNT34) >= 3 OR (CNT32+CNT33+CNT34) >= 3 THEN 0 WHEN (CNT3 > 0 AND (CNT1+CNT2) > 0 AND (CNT4+CNT6) > 1) OR TCNT = 0 THEN 0 WHEN (CNT3 > 0 OR (CNT1+CNT2) > 0 ) AND (CNT4+CNT6) > 2 THEN 0 WHEN (CNT4+CNT6) > 2 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END = 1
OPTIMIZE FOR 1 ROW WITH UR

ac02.car_no , REPLACE(CHAR(ac00.accd_date), '-', '') accd_date , REPLACE(REPLACE(CHAR(ac00.accd_time), ':', ''), '.', '') accd_time , '(' || SUBSTR(ac00.zip_code, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(ac00.zip_code, 4) || ') ' || ac00.city_do || ' ' || ac00.city_ku_cnty || ' ' || ac00.dong_myeon || ' ' || ac00.accd_detl_place As accd_place , victim.accd_pty_name , al01.clerk_no , stf0.clerk_name , hand_zone_no , cell.contact_no2 as hand_ofce_no , cell.contact_no3 as hand_tele_no , fax.contact_no1 as fax_no1 , fax.contact_no2 as fax_no2 , fax.contact_no3 as fax_no3 , CASE WHEN (COALESCE((SELECT CHAR(max(sv15.issue_date)) || CHAR(max(sv15.issue_order)) FROM pcsv15tb sv15 WHERE sv15.bsns_cls = victim.fk_bsns_cls AND sv15.rciv_date = victim.fk_rciv_date AND sv15.rciv_seq_num = victim.fk_rciv_seq_num AND sv15.covr_cls = victim.covr_cls AND sv15.dam_order = victim.dam_order AND sv15.issue_company = (SELECT FK_PTY_ID FROM GCCE20TB WHERE HOSPITAL_CODE = #hptlCd# AND APPL_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AND sv15.issue_cls = 'E1' AND sv15.issue_method = 'A'), '')) = '' THEN '' WHEN (SUBSTR(COALESCE((SELECT CHAR(max(sv15.issue_date)) || CHAR(max(sv15.issue_order)) FROM pcsv15tb sv15 WHERE sv15.bsns_cls = victim.fk_bsns_cls AND sv15.rciv_date = victim.fk_rciv_date AND sv15.rciv_seq_num = victim.fk_rciv_seq_num AND sv15.covr_cls = victim.covr_cls AND sv15.dam_order = victim.dam_order AND sv15.issue_company = (SELECT FK_PTY_ID FROM GCCE20TB WHERE HOSPITAL_CODE = #hptlCd# AND APPL_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AND sv15.issue_cls = 'E1' AND sv15.issue_method = 'A'), ''), 1, 10)) = '0001-01-01' THEN '1' ELSE '2' END as issStt FROM pcac02tb ac02 , pcac00tb ac00 , pcac01tb ac01 , pcac01tb victim , pcal01tb al01 LEFT OUTER JOIN staff0tb stf0 ON al01.clerk_no = stf0.clerk_no LEFT OUTER JOIN stfcnttb cell on cell.fk_staff0tbclerk_n = stf0.clerk_no and cell.contact_cls = '32' and cell.appl_end_date = '9999-12-31' LEFT OUTER JOIN stfcnttb fax on fax.fk_staff0tbclerk_n = stf0.clerk_no and fax.contact_cls = '22' and fax.appl_end_date = '9999-12-31' LEFT OUTER JOIN dept00tb dp00 ON al01.dept_code = dp00.dept_cd WHERE ac02.car_no = #pibojaCarNo# AND ac02.seq_num = 1 AND ac00.accd_date BETWEEN #fromAccdDate# AND #toAccdDate# AND ac02.fk_bsns_cls = ac00.bsns_cls AND ac02.fk_rciv_date = ac00.rciv_date AND ac02.fk_rciv_seq_num = ac00.rciv_seq_num AND ac01.seq_num = 1 AND ac01.pty_cls = '1' AND ac00.bsns_cls = ac01.fk_bsns_cls AND ac00.rciv_date = ac01.fk_rciv_date AND ac00.rciv_seq_num = ac01.fk_rciv_seq_num AND victim.pty_cls = '2' AND ac00.bsns_cls = victim.fk_bsns_cls AND ac00.rciv_date = victim.fk_rciv_date AND ac00.rciv_seq_num = victim.fk_rciv_seq_num AND victim.fk_bsns_cls = al01.bsns_cls AND victim.fk_rciv_date = al01.rciv_date AND victim.fk_rciv_seq_num = al01.rciv_seq_num AND al01.pcac01_pcac02_cls = '1' AND victim.seq_num = al01.pcac01_pcac02_seq SELECT sum.clerk_no, sum.clerk_name, sum.dept_cd, sum.dept_cmps_name, sum.new_count, sum.in_count, sum.out_count, (sum.new_count + sum.in_count - sum.out_count) AS sum_new, sum.no_count, sum.end_count, (sum.no_count + sum.end_count) AS sum_no, sum.before_count, sum.after_count, (sum.before_count + sum.after_count) AS sum_before FROM ( SELECT staf.clerk_no, staf.clerk_name, staf.dept_cd, staf.dept_cmps_name, ( SELECT COUNT(clerk_no) AS new_count FROM pcal01tb WHERE clerk_no = staf.clerk_no AND chrg_dtbn_date >= #sDate:String# AND chrg_dtbn_date <= #eDate:String# AND dam_cls = '1' AND seq_num = 1 AND bsns_cls = '1' AND covr_cls = #covrCls:String# ), ( SELECT COUNT(clerk_no) AS in_count FROM pcal01tb WHERE clerk_no = staf.clerk_no AND chrg_dtbn_date >= #sDate:String# AND chrg_dtbn_date <= #eDate:String# AND dam_cls = '1' AND seq_num > 1 AND bsns_cls = '1' AND covr_cls = #covrCls:String# ), ( SELECT COUNT(clerk_no) AS out_count FROM pcal01tb WHERE clerk_no = staf.clerk_no AND chrg_dtbn_date >= #sDate:String# AND chrg_dtbn_date <= #eDate:String# AND dam_cls = '1' AND dam_stf_sts = '3' AND bsns_cls = '1' AND covr_cls = #covrCls:String# ), ( SELECT COUNT(xmp_emp) AS no_count FROM pcrq14tb WHERE xmp_emp = staf.clerk_no AND ter_date >= #sDate:String# AND ter_date <= #eDate:String# AND xmp_ord_num = 0 AND ter_cls = '2' AND covr_cls = #covrCls:String# ), ( SELECT COUNT(xmp_emp) AS end_count FROM pcrq14tb WHERE xmp_emp = staf.clerk_no AND ter_date = #sDate:String# AND ter_date = #eDate:String# AND xmp_ord_num = 0 AND ter_cls = '1' AND covr_cls = #covrCls:String# ), ( SELECT COUNT(a.clerk_no) AS before_count FROM pcal01tb a WHERE a.clerk_no = staf.clerk_no AND a.chrg_dtbn_ter_date = '9999-12-31' AND a.dam_cls = '1' AND a.bsns_cls = '1' AND a.dam_stf_sts = '1' AND a.covr_cls = #covrCls:String# AND not exists ( SELECT 1 FROM pcos00tb b WHERE b.fk_bsns_cls = '1' AND b.fk_rciv_date = a.rciv_date AND b.fk_rciv_seq_num = a.rciv_seq_num AND b.fk_covr_cls = a.covr_cls AND b.fk_dam_order = a.dam_order AND b.os_rank = 1 ) ), ( SELECT COUNT(a.clerk_no) AS after_count FROM pcal01tb a WHERE a.clerk_no = staf.clerk_no AND a.chrg_dtbn_ter_date = '9999-12-31' AND a.dam_cls = '1' AND a.bsns_cls = '1' AND a.dam_stf_sts = '1' AND a.covr_cls = #covrCls:String# AND exists ( SELECT 1 FROM pcos00tb b WHERE b.fk_bsns_cls = '1' AND b.fk_rciv_date = a.rciv_date AND b.fk_rciv_seq_num = a.rciv_seq_num AND b.fk_covr_cls = a.covr_cls AND b.fk_dam_order = a.dam_order AND b.os_rank = 1 ) ) FROM staff0tb staf WHERE staf.nsanc_dept_cd = #keyCode:String# AND staf.rt_frm_date = '9999-12-31' ) sum ORDER BY sum.clerk_no ASC WITH UR

WHEN sv59.fk_bsns_cls = '1' THEN 6 ELSE 5 END ) chkProc from pcac02tb ac02 LEFT JOIN pcsv59tb sv59 ON sv59.fk_bsns_cls = ac02.fk_bsns_cls and sv59.fk_rciv_date = ac02.fk_rciv_date and sv59.fk_rciv_seq_num = ac02.fk_rciv_seq_num and sv59.fk_seq_num = ac02.seq_num and sv59.appl_end_date = '9999-12-31' AND sv59.covr_cls = ac02.covr_cls AND sv59.dam_order = ac02.dam_order LEFT JOIN PCRQ30TB rq30 ON rq30.fk_bsns_cls = sv59.fk_bsns_cls AND rq30.fk_rciv_date = sv59.fk_rciv_date AND rq30.fk_rciv_seq_num = sv59.fk_rciv_seq_num AND rq30.fk_seq_num = 1 AND rq30.fk_covr_cls = sv59.covr_cls AND rq30.fk_dam_order = sv59.dam_order AND rq30.coop_pty_id = sv59.coop_pty_id AND rq30.req_rep_occ = sv59.coop_cls AND rq30.req_end_date = '9999-12-31' AND rq30.req_proc_stt != '9' LEFT JOIN pcpa03tb pa03 ON pa03.fk_bsns_cls = rq30.fk_bsns_cls AND pa03.fk_rciv_date = rq30.fk_rciv_date AND pa03.fk_rciv_seq_num = rq30.fk_rciv_seq_num AND pa03.fk_agt_seq_num = 1 AND pa03.fk_covr_cls = rq30.fk_covr_cls AND pa03.fk_dam_order = rq30.fk_dam_order AND pa03.dtmn_cls IN ('01','02','03','92','29','') AND pa03.sanc_cls = '2' AND pa03.rq10_seq_num = rq30.rq10_seq_num AND pa03.pty_no = rq30.coop_pty_id AND pa03.pay_pty_cls = ( CASE WHEN rq30.req_rep_occ = '9' THEN '14' WHEN rq30.req_rep_occ = '8' THEN '15' WHEN rq30.req_rep_occ = 'G' THEN '16' WHEN rq30.req_rep_occ = 'F' THEN '21' WHEN rq30.req_rep_occ = 'R' THEN '18' else '' END )
WHERE (ac02.fk_bsns_cls, ac02.fk_rciv_date, ac02.fk_rciv_seq_num, ac02.covr_cls, ac02.dam_order) IN ( values ( '$bsnsCls0$', '$rcivDate0$', $rcivSeqNum0$, '$covrCls0$', $damOrder0$ ) , ( '$bsnsCls1$', '$rcivDate1$', $rcivSeqNum1$, '$covrCls1$', $damOrder1$ ) , ( '$bsnsCls2$', '$rcivDate2$', $rcivSeqNum2$, '$covrCls2$', $damOrder2$ ) , ( '$bsnsCls3$', '$rcivDate3$', $rcivSeqNum3$, '$covrCls3$', $damOrder3$ ) , ( '$bsnsCls4$', '$rcivDate4$', $rcivSeqNum4$, '$covrCls4$', $damOrder4$ ) , ( '$bsnsCls5$', '$rcivDate5$', $rcivSeqNum5$, '$covrCls5$', $damOrder5$ ) , ( '$bsnsCls6$', '$rcivDate6$', $rcivSeqNum6$, '$covrCls6$', $damOrder6$ ) , ( '$bsnsCls7$', '$rcivDate7$', $rcivSeqNum7$, '$covrCls7$', $damOrder7$ ) , ( '$bsnsCls8$', '$rcivDate8$', $rcivSeqNum8$, '$covrCls8$', $damOrder8$ ) , ( '$bsnsCls9$', '$rcivDate9$', $rcivSeqNum9$, '$covrCls9$', $damOrder9$ ) , ( '$bsnsCls10$', '$rcivDate10$', $rcivSeqNum10$, '$covrCls10$', $damOrder10$ ) , ( '$bsnsCls11$', '$rcivDate11$', $rcivSeqNum11$, '$covrCls11$', $damOrder11$ ) , ( '$bsnsCls12$', '$rcivDate12$', $rcivSeqNum12$, '$covrCls12$', $damOrder12$ ) , ( '$bsnsCls13$', '$rcivDate13$', $rcivSeqNum13$, '$covrCls13$', $damOrder13$ ) , ( '$bsnsCls14$', '$rcivDate14$', $rcivSeqNum14$, '$covrCls14$', $damOrder14$ ) ) ) REQ LEFT OUTER JOIN gccc00tb cc00 ON cc00.pty_id = REQ.coop_pty_id LEFT OUTER JOIN cczp20tb cczp20 ON cczp20.zip_code = (case when cc00.office_nwod_cls = '01' then cc00.ofc_zip_no else cc00.rd_ofc_zip_no end)
AND cczp20.zip_code_seq = (case when cc00.office_nwod_cls = '01' and cc00.ofc_zip_no_seq < 1000 then 1 else cc00.rd_ofc_zip_no_seq end)
AND cczp20.seq_num = 1 INNER JOIN TABLE( SELECT (CASE WHEN T03.fk_bsns_cls ='1' THEN 9 WHEN COALESCE(T30.rq10_seq_num,0) > 0 THEN 8 WHEN COALESCE(T30.seq_num,0) > 0 THEN 7 WHEN T59.fk_bsns_cls = '1' THEN 6 ELSE 5 END ) chkProc , (CASE WHEN COALESCE(T30.req_date, '0001-01-01') = '0001-01-01' THEN COALESCE(T59.input_date, '0001-01-01') ELSE T30.req_date END) req_date , (CASE WHEN COALESCE(T30.req_time, '00:00:00') = '00:00:00' THEN COALESCE(T59.input_time, '00:00:00') ELSE T30.req_time END) req_time FROM pcac02tb T02 LEFT JOIN PCSV59TB T59 ON T59.fk_bsns_cls = T02.fk_bsns_cls and T59.fk_rciv_date = T02.fk_rciv_date and T59.fk_rciv_seq_num = T02.fk_rciv_seq_num and T59.fk_seq_num = T02.seq_num and T59.appl_end_date = '9999-12-31' AND T59.covr_cls = T02.covr_cls AND T59.dam_order = T02.dam_order AND T59.coop_cls = REQ.coop_cls left join PCRQ30TB T30 ON T30.fk_bsns_cls = T59.FK_BSNS_CLS AND T30.fk_rciv_date = T59.fk_rciv_date AND T30.fk_rciv_seq_num = T59.fk_rciv_seq_num AND T30.fk_seq_num = 1 AND T30.fk_covr_cls = T59.covr_cls AND T30.fk_dam_order = T59.dam_order AND T30.coop_pty_id = T59.coop_pty_id AND T30.req_rep_occ = T59.coop_cls AND T30.req_end_date = '9999-12-31' AND T30.req_proc_stt != '9' LEFT JOIN pcpa03tb T03 ON T03.fk_bsns_cls = T30.fk_bsns_cls AND T03.fk_rciv_date = T30.fk_rciv_date AND T03.fk_rciv_seq_num = T30.fk_rciv_seq_num AND T03.fk_agt_seq_num = 1 AND T03.fk_covr_cls = T30.fk_covr_cls AND T03.fk_dam_order = T30.fk_dam_order AND T03.dtmn_cls IN ('01','02','03','92','29','') AND T03.sanc_cls = '2' AND T03.rq10_seq_num = T30.rq10_seq_num AND T03.pty_no = T30.coop_pty_id AND T03.pay_pty_cls = ( CASE WHEN T30.req_rep_occ = '9' THEN '14' WHEN T30.req_rep_occ = '8' THEN '15' WHEN T30.req_rep_occ = 'G' THEN '16' WHEN T30.req_rep_occ = 'F' THEN '21' WHEN T30.req_rep_occ = 'R' THEN '18' else '' END ) WHERE T02.fk_bsns_cls = REQ.FK_BSNS_CLS AND T02.fk_rciv_date = REQ.fk_rciv_date And T02.fk_rciv_seq_num = REQ.fk_rciv_seq_num And T02.SEQ_NUM = REQ.seq_num ORDER BY chkProc DESC, req_date DESC, req_time DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) A ON 1=1
WHERE REQ.chkProc = A.chkProc AND REQ.req_date = A.req_date AND REQ.req_time = A.req_time ) RES group by RES.fk_bsns_cls, RES.fk_rciv_date , RES.fk_rciv_seq_num , RES.covr_cls, RES.dam_order OPTIMIZE FOR 1 ROW FOR READ ONLY WITH UR

SELECT MAX(A.SUBSC_REGN_YN)+ MAX(A.NOTI_DETL_REGN_YN)+ MAX(A.COVR_CFRM_REGN_YN)+ MAX(A.CUST_CFRM_REGN_YN)+ MAX(A.ETC1)+ MAX(A.ETC7)+ MAX(A.ETC8)+ MAX(A.ETC9)+ MAX(A.ETC10)+ MAX(A.ETC11)+ MAX(A.ETC12)+ MAX(A.ETC13)+ MAX(A.ETC14)+ MAX(A.ETC15)+ MAX(A.ETC16) TOTAL_SCAN_COUNT FROM ( SELECT (CASE WHEN SUBSC_REGN_YN=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) SUBSC_REGN_YN, (CASE WHEN NOTI_DETL_REGN_YN=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) NOTI_DETL_REGN_YN, (CASE WHEN COVR_CFRM_REGN_YN=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) COVR_CFRM_REGN_YN, (CASE WHEN CUST_CFRM_REGN_YN=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) CUST_CFRM_REGN_YN, (CASE WHEN ETC1=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC1, (CASE WHEN ETC2=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC2, (CASE WHEN ETC3=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC3, (CASE WHEN ETC4=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC4, (CASE WHEN ETC5=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC5, (CASE WHEN ETC7=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC7, (CASE WHEN ETC8=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC8, (CASE WHEN ETC9=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC9, (CASE WHEN ETC10=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC10, (CASE WHEN ETC11=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC11, (CASE WHEN ETC12=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC12, (CASE WHEN ETC13=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC13, (CASE WHEN ETC14=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC14, (CASE WHEN ETC15=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC15, (CASE WHEN ETC16=' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ETC16 FROM PPQT04TB WHERE BAS_DATE = #scanResult.basDate# AND ENTY_DSGN_NO = #scanResult.relNo# AND DSGN_SEQ_NUM = #scanResult.entyDsgnSeq# ) A WITH UR

SELECT TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.A_CNT)))||','|| TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.B_CNT)))||','|| TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.C_CNT)))||','|| TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.D_CNT)))||','|| TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.E_CNT)))||','|| TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.F_CNT)))||','|| TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.G_CNT)))||','|| TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.H_CNT))) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) A_CNT, 0 B_CNT, 0 C_CNT, 0 D_CNT, 0 E_CNT, 0 F_CNT, 0 G_CNT, 0 H_CNT FROM PCAL01TB A, PCAC20TB B WHERE A.BSNS_CLS = '1' AND A.DAM_CLS = '1' AND A.CLERK_NO = #loginClerkNo# AND A.CHRG_DTBN_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND B.BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND B.RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND B.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND B.INPUT_CLS = '2' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PCOS00TB WHERE FK_BSNS_CLS = '1' AND FK_RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND FK_COVR_CLS = A.COVR_CLS AND FK_DAM_ORDER = A.DAM_ORDER AND OS_RANK = 1) UNION ALL SELECT 0 A_CNT, COUNT(*) B_CNT, 0 C_CNT, 0 D_CNT, 0 E_CNT, 0 F_CNT, 0 G_CNT, 0 H_CNT FROM PCAL01TB A, PCLG01TB B WHERE A.BSNS_CLS = '1' AND A.DAM_CLS = '1' AND A.CLERK_NO = #loginClerkNo# AND A.CHRG_DTBN_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND B.BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND B.RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND B.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND B.COVR_CLS = '' AND B.DAM_ORDER = 0 AND B.PRC_CLS = '55' AND B.SEQ_NUM = ( SELECT MAX(SEQ_NUM) FROM PCLG01TB C WHERE C.BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND C.RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND C.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND C.COVR_CLS = '' AND C.DAM_ORDER = 0 AND C.PRC_CLS = '55' AND C.APP_END_DATE = '9999-12-31') UNION ALL SELECT 0 A_CNT, 0 B_CNT, COUNT(*) C_CNT, 0 D_CNT, 0 E_CNT, 0 F_CNT, 0 G_CNT, 0 H_CNT FROM PCSV05TB A, (SELECT B.BSNS_CLS ,B.RCIV_DATE ,B.RCIV_SEQ_NUM FROM PCAL01TB B WHERE B.BSNS_CLS = '1' AND B.DAM_CLS = '1' AND B.CLERK_NO = #loginClerkNo# AND B.CHRG_DTBN_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PCSV05TB C WHERE C.FK_BSNS_CLS = B.BSNS_CLS AND C.FK_RCIV_DATE = B.RCIV_DATE AND C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = B.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND C.CS_RSLT = '5') ) D WHERE A.FK_BSNS_CLS = D.BSNS_CLS AND A.FK_RCIV_DATE = D.RCIV_DATE AND A.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = D.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND A.CS_RSLT = '5' UNION ALL SELECT 0 A_CNT, 0 B_CNT, 0 C_CNT, COUNT(*) D_CNT, 0 E_CNT, 0 F_CNT, 0 G_CNT, 0 H_CNT FROM PCAL01TB A, PCAC01TB C WHERE A.BSNS_CLS = '1' AND A.DAM_CLS = '1' AND A.CLERK_NO = #loginClerkNo# AND A.CHRG_DTBN_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND C.FK_BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND C.FK_RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND C.COVR_CLS = A.COVR_CLS AND C.DAM_ORDER = A.DAM_ORDER AND (DAYS(CURRENT DATE) - DAYS(C.RL_RCIV_DATE)) > 3 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PCOS00TB B WHERE B.FK_BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND B.FK_RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND B.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND B.FK_COVR_CLS = A.COVR_CLS AND B.FK_DAM_ORDER = A.DAM_ORDER AND B.OS_RANK = 1) UNION ALL SELECT 0 A_CNT, 0 B_CNT, 0 C_CNT, 0 D_CNT, COUNT(*) E_CNT, 0 F_CNT, 0 G_CNT, 0 H_CNT FROM PCAL01TB A LEFT OUTER JOIN PCAC01TB C ON C.FK_BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND C.FK_RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND C.COVR_CLS = A.COVR_CLS AND C.DAM_ORDER = A.DAM_ORDER LEFT OUTER JOIN PCAC02TB E ON E.FK_BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND E.FK_RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND E.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND E.COVR_CLS = A.COVR_CLS AND E.DAM_ORDER = A.DAM_ORDER LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT HPTL_NM, DIAG_CLS FROM PCSV10TB WHERE FK_BSNS_CLS = C.FK_BSNS_CLS AND FK_RCIV_DATE = C.FK_RCIV_DATE AND FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND FK_PTY_ID = C.PTY_ID ORDER BY SEQ_NUM DESC FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY) D ON 1 = 1 WHERE A.BSNS_CLS = '1' AND A.DAM_CLS = '1' AND A.CLERK_NO = #loginClerkNo# AND A.CHRG_DTBN_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' ) AL WITH UR

SELECT TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.A_CNT)))||','|| TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.B_CNT)))||','|| TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.C_CNT)))||','|| TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.D_CNT)))||','|| TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.E_CNT)))||','|| TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.F_CNT)))||','|| TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.G_CNT)))||','|| TRIM(CHAR(SUM(AL.H_CNT))) FROM ( SELECT 0 A_CNT, 0 B_CNT, 0 C_CNT, 0 D_CNT, 0 E_CNT, COUNT(*) F_CNT, 0 G_CNT, 0 H_CNT FROM PCAL01TB A, PCAC01TB C, PCSV12TB B, PCAC00TB D, PCSV00TB E WHERE A.BSNS_CLS = '1' AND A.DAM_CLS = '1' AND A.CLERK_NO = #loginClerkNo# AND A.CHRG_DTBN_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND C.FK_BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND C.FK_RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND C.COVR_CLS = A.COVR_CLS AND C.DAM_ORDER = A.DAM_ORDER AND B.FK_BSNS_CLS = C.FK_BSNS_CLS AND B.FK_RCIV_DATE = C.FK_RCIV_DATE AND B.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND B.FK_PTY_ID = C.PTY_ID
AND (B.GBHA_CLS = '1' AND B.END_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND B.RPSN_GBHA BETWEEN '0100' AND '0399' AND D.BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND D.RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND D.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND D.ACCD_CLS = '20' AND (DAYS(CURRENT DATE) - DAYS(D.ACCD_DATE)) > 180 AND E.FK_BSNS_CLS = C.FK_BSNS_CLS AND E.FK_RCIV_DATE = C.FK_RCIV_DATE AND E.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND E.PTY_ID = C.PTY_ID AND E.INJR_CLS IN('1','4')
OR B.GBHA_CLS = '1' AND B.END_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND B.RPSN_GBHA BETWEEN '0400' AND '0699' AND D.BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND D.RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND D.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND D.ACCD_CLS = '20' AND (DAYS(CURRENT DATE) - DAYS(D.ACCD_DATE)) > 90 AND E.FK_BSNS_CLS = C.FK_BSNS_CLS AND E.FK_RCIV_DATE = C.FK_RCIV_DATE AND E.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND E.PTY_ID = C.PTY_ID AND E.INJR_CLS IN('1','4')
OR D.BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND D.RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND D.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND D.ACCD_CLS = '20' AND (DAYS(CURRENT DATE) - DAYS(D.ACCD_DATE)) > 180 AND E.FK_BSNS_CLS = C.FK_BSNS_CLS AND E.FK_RCIV_DATE = C.FK_RCIV_DATE AND E.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND E.PTY_ID = C.PTY_ID AND E.INJR_CLS IN('2','3') )
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PCPA03TB F WHERE F.FK_BSNS_CLS = C.FK_BSNS_CLS AND F.FK_RCIV_DATE = C.FK_RCIV_DATE AND F.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND F.FK_COVR_CLS = C.COVR_CLS AND F.FK_DAM_ORDER = C.DAM_ORDER AND F.PAY_TYPE = '01') UNION ALL SELECT 0 A_CNT, 0 B_CNT, 0 C_CNT, 0 D_CNT, 0 E_CNT, 0 F_CNT, COUNT(*) G_CNT, 0 H_CNT FROM PCAL01TB A, PCAC01TB C, PCSV12TB B, PCAC00TB D, PCSV00TB E WHERE A.BSNS_CLS = '1' AND A.DAM_CLS = '1' AND A.CLERK_NO = #loginClerkNo# AND A.CHRG_DTBN_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND C.FK_BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND C.FK_RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND C.COVR_CLS = A.COVR_CLS AND C.DAM_ORDER = A.DAM_ORDER AND B.FK_BSNS_CLS = C.FK_BSNS_CLS AND B.FK_RCIV_DATE = C.FK_RCIV_DATE AND B.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND B.FK_PTY_ID = C.PTY_ID
AND B.GBHA_CLS = '1' AND B.END_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND B.RPSN_GBHA BETWEEN '0700' AND '9999' AND D.BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND D.RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND D.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND D.ACCD_CLS = '20' AND (DAYS(CURRENT DATE) - DAYS(D.ACCD_DATE)) > 30 AND E.FK_BSNS_CLS = C.FK_BSNS_CLS AND E.FK_RCIV_DATE = C.FK_RCIV_DATE AND E.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND E.PTY_ID = C.PTY_ID AND E.INJR_CLS IN('1','4')
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PCPA03TB F WHERE F.FK_BSNS_CLS = C.FK_BSNS_CLS AND F.FK_RCIV_DATE = C.FK_RCIV_DATE AND F.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND F.FK_COVR_CLS = C.COVR_CLS AND F.FK_DAM_ORDER = C.DAM_ORDER AND F.PAY_TYPE = '01') UNION ALL SELECT 0 A_CNT, 0 B_CNT, 0 C_CNT, 0 D_CNT, 0 E_CNT, 0 F_CNT, 0 G_CNT, COUNT(*) H_CNT FROM PCAL01TB A, PCPA03TB B INNER JOIN TABLE (SELECT AGREE_DATE FROM PCPA05TB WHERE FK_BSNS_CLS = B.FK_BSNS_CLS AND FK_RCIV_DATE = B.FK_RCIV_DATE AND FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = B.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND FK_COVR_CLS = B.FK_COVR_CLS AND FK_DAM_ORDER = B.FK_DAM_ORDER AND AGREE_DATE > '0001-01-01' ORDER BY AGREE_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY) D ON 1=1, PCAC01TB C WHERE A.BSNS_CLS = '1' AND A.DAM_CLS = '1' AND A.CLERK_NO = #loginClerkNo# AND A.CHRG_DTBN_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND C.FK_BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND C.FK_RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND C.COVR_CLS = A.COVR_CLS AND C.DAM_ORDER = A.DAM_ORDER AND B.FK_BSNS_CLS = C.FK_BSNS_CLS AND B.FK_RCIV_DATE = C.FK_RCIV_DATE AND B.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND B.FK_COVR_CLS = C.COVR_CLS AND B.FK_DAM_ORDER = C.DAM_ORDER AND B.PAY_TYPE = '01' AND (DAYS(CURRENT DATE) - DAYS(D.AGREE_DATE)) > 10 ) AL WITH UR

SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM PCAL01TB A, PCAC02TB C LEFT OUTER JOIN PCSV51TB D ON D.FK_BSNS_CLS = C.FK_BSNS_CLS AND D.FK_RCIV_DATE = C.FK_RCIV_DATE AND D.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND D.FK_SEQ_NUM = C.SEQ_NUM AND D.INPUT_CLS = '2' AND D.APP_END_DATE = '9999-12-31' LEFT OUTER JOIN PCRQ00TB B ON B.FK_BSNS_CLS = C.FK_BSNS_CLS AND B.FK_RCIV_DATE = C.FK_RCIV_DATE AND B.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND B.COVR_CLS = C.COVR_CLS AND B.DAM_ORDER = C.DAM_ORDER WHERE A.BSNS_CLS = '1' AND A.DAM_CLS = '1' AND A.TEAM_CODE = #teamCode# AND A.CHRG_DTBN_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND C.FK_BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND C.FK_RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND C.COVR_CLS = A.COVR_CLS AND C.DAM_ORDER = A.DAM_ORDER AND (DAYS(CURRENT DATE) - DAYS(C.RCIV_DATE)) > 30) cnt ,A.RCIV_DATE ITEM_1 ,A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM ITEM_2 ,A.COVR_CLS ITEM_3 ,A.DAM_ORDER ITEM_4 ,C.CAR_NO ITEM_5 ,B.OS_INS_MNY ITEM_6 ,B.ACC_DTMN_AMT ITEM_7 ,D.FCTR_NAME ITEM_8 ,(SELECT CLERK_NAME FROM STAFF0TB WHERE CLERK_NO = A.CLERK_NO) AS ITEM_9 ,C.RCIV_DATE AS ITEM_10 ,DAYS(CURRENT DATE) - DAYS(C.RCIV_DATE) AS ITEM_11 ,'' ITEM_12 FROM PCAL01TB A, PCAC02TB C LEFT OUTER JOIN PCSV51TB D ON D.FK_BSNS_CLS = C.FK_BSNS_CLS AND D.FK_RCIV_DATE = C.FK_RCIV_DATE AND D.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND D.FK_SEQ_NUM = C.SEQ_NUM AND D.INPUT_CLS = '2' AND D.APP_END_DATE = '9999-12-31' LEFT OUTER JOIN PCRQ00TB B ON B.FK_BSNS_CLS = C.FK_BSNS_CLS AND B.FK_RCIV_DATE = C.FK_RCIV_DATE AND B.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND B.COVR_CLS = C.COVR_CLS AND B.DAM_ORDER = C.DAM_ORDER WHERE A.BSNS_CLS = '1' AND A.DAM_CLS = '1' AND A.TEAM_CODE = #teamCode# AND A.CHRG_DTBN_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND C.FK_BSNS_CLS = A.BSNS_CLS AND C.FK_RCIV_DATE = A.RCIV_DATE AND C.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND C.COVR_CLS = A.COVR_CLS AND C.DAM_ORDER = A.DAM_ORDER AND (DAYS(CURRENT DATE) - DAYS(C.RCIV_DATE)) > 30 AND A.RCIV_DATE <= #rcivDate# AND ( A.RCIV_DATE < #rcivDate# OR (A.RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM < #rcivSeqNum#) OR (A.RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = #rcivSeqNum# and A.COVR_CLS < #covrCls#) OR (A.RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM = #rcivSeqNum# and A.COVR_CLS = #covrCls# and A.DAM_ORDER <= #damOrder#) ) GROUP BY ADCD ORDER BY A.RCIV_DATE DESC ,A.RCIV_SEQ_NUM DESC,A.COVR_CLS DESC,A.DAM_ORDER DESC FETCH FIRST 9 ROWS ONLY GROUP BY ACD, DCD
WITH UR

SELECT SS.CLERK_NO ,BB.CLERK_NAME ,BB.FK_DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD ,BB.FK_PART_CD AS PART_CD ,CC.PART_NAME AS PART_NAME ,SS.GROUP FROM ( SELECT VALUE(AA.OLD_CLERK_NO, AA.NEW_CLERK_NO) AS CLERK_NO ,AA.GROUP FROM ( SELECT VALUE(MIN(CASE WHEN F.ALLOC_UNIT <= B.ATT_NUM_1 AND F.CLERK_NO > B.CODE_KEY_4 THEN F.CLERK_NO END) ,MIN(CASE WHEN F.ALLOC_UNIT <= 1 AND F.CLERK_NO > ' ' THEN F.CLERK_NO END)) AS NEW_CLERK_NO ,MAX(ST00.OLD_CLERK_NO) AS OLD_CLERK_NO ,MAX(B.APPL_CODE) AS GROUP FROM PCCA20TB A ,PCCA20TB B ,PCCA01TB F LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT MAX(AL07.CHRG_CLERK_NO) AS OLD_CLERK_NO FROM PCAL07TB AL07 ,PCCA20TB CA20 ,PCCA01TB CA01 ,STAFF0TB S WHERE AL07.FK_BSNS_CLS = #bsnsCls# AND AL07.FK_RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND AL07.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = #rcivSeqNum# AND AL07.FK_PTY_ID = #piboPtyId# AND AL07.DTBN_TER_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND CA20.GRP_CODE_TYPE = '2006' AND CA20.CODE_TYPE_1 = '26' AND CA20.APPL_CODE = CA01.FK_DEPT_CD AND CA20.ATT_NUM_1 = CA01.FK_PART_CD AND CA20.APPL_END_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND CA01.CLERK_NO = AL07.CHRG_CLERK_NO AND CA01.CLERK_NO = S.CLERK_NO AND S.RT_FRM_DATE = '9999-12-31' ) ST00 ON 1=1 ,STAFF0TB S WHERE A.GRP_CODE_TYPE = '2006' AND A.CODE_TYPE_1 = '26' AND A.APPL_END_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND B.GRP_CODE_TYPE = '2006' AND B.CODE_TYPE_1 = '27' AND B.APPL_CODE = A.CODE_KEY_2 AND B.APPL_END_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND A.APPL_CODE = F.FK_DEPT_CD AND A.ATT_NUM_1 = F.FK_PART_CD AND F.ALLOC_UNIT > 0 AND F.CLERK_NO = S.CLERK_NO AND S.RT_FRM_DATE = '9999-12-31' ) AA ) SS ,PCCA01TB BB ,PCCA00TB CC WHERE SS.CLERK_NO = BB.CLERK_NO AND BB.FK_DEPT_CD = CC.DEPT_CD AND BB.FK_PART_CD = CC.PART_CD OPTIMIZE FOR 1 ROW WITH UR

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM (SELECT FK_BSNS_CLS, FK_RCIV_DATE, FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM, PTY_ID FROM PCRQ00TB WHERE FK_BSNS_CLS = #bsnsCls# AND FK_RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = #rcivSeqNum# GROUP BY FK_BSNS_CLS, FK_RCIV_DATE, FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM, PTY_ID) GROUP BY FK_BSNS_CLS, FK_RCIV_DATE, FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM ) AS CHK_CNT1 ,0 AS CHK_CNT2 ,( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN DPSR_ERR_YN = '1' AND DPSR_REL IN ('1', '2','3','B','C') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS CHK FROM PCPS00TB WHERE FK_BSNS_CLS = #bsnsCls# AND FK_RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = #rcivSeqNum# AND FK_PTY_ID = #piboPtyId# AND DAM_CLS = '10' AND END_DATE = '9999-12-31' ) AS CHK_CNT3 ,0 AS CHK_CNT4 ,0 AS CHK_CNT5 ,( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM PCPS01TB WHERE FK_BSNS_CLS = #bsnsCls# AND FK_RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = #rcivSeqNum# AND FK_PTY_ID = #piboPtyId# AND DAM_CLS = '10' AND PROC_CLS = '04' AND PRE_INFO_CLS = 'DM501' ) AS CHK_CNT6 , 0 AS CHK_CNT7 , ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS TCNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBJECT_CODE IN ('CM201','CM202','CM203') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBJECT_CODE IN ('CM251','CM252','CM253') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1='01' AND SUBJECT_CODE NOT IN ('CM201','CM202','CM203','CM251','CM252','CM253') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1='01' AND SUBJECT_CODE NOT IN ('CM201','CM202','CM203','CM251','CM252','CM253') AND CODE_KEY_2 = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT30 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1='01' AND SUBJECT_CODE NOT IN ('CM201','CM202','CM203','CM251','CM252','CM253') AND CODE_KEY_2 = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT31 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1='01' AND SUBJECT_CODE NOT IN ('CM201','CM202','CM203','CM251','CM252','CM253') AND CODE_KEY_2 = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT32 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1='01' AND SUBJECT_CODE NOT IN ('CM201','CM202','CM203','CM251','CM252','CM253') AND CODE_KEY_2 = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT33 ,SUM(CASE WHEN CODE_TYPE_1='01' AND SUBJECT_CODE NOT IN ('CM201','CM202','CM203','CM251','CM252','CM253') AND CODE_KEY_2 = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CNT34 FROM PCRQ00TB RQ00 ,PCOS01TB OS01 ,PCCA20TB CA20 WHERE RQ00.FK_BSNS_CLS = #bsnsCls# AND RQ00.FK_RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND RQ00.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = #rcivSeqNum# AND RQ00.PTY_ID = #piboPtyId# AND RQ00.FK_BSNS_CLS = OS01.FK_BSNS_CLS AND RQ00.FK_RCIV_DATE = OS01.FK_RCIV_DATE AND RQ00.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = OS01.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND RQ00.FK_SEQ_NUM = OS01.FK_AGT_SEQ_NUM AND RQ00.COVR_CLS = OS01.FK_COVR_CLS AND RQ00.DAM_ORDER = OS01.FK_DAM_ORDER AND OS01.FK_OS_RANK = (SELECT MAX(OS_RANK) FROM PCOS00TB OS00 WHERE RQ00.FK_BSNS_CLS = OS00.FK_BSNS_CLS AND RQ00.FK_RCIV_DATE = OS00.FK_RCIV_DATE AND RQ00.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = OS00.FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM AND RQ00.FK_SEQ_NUM = OS00.FK_AGT_SEQ_NUM AND RQ00.COVR_CLS = OS00.FK_COVR_CLS AND RQ00.DAM_ORDER = OS00.FK_DAM_ORDER) AND CA20.GRP_CODE_TYPE = '2007' AND CA20.CODE_TYPE_1 = '01' AND CA20.APPL_END_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND CA20.APPL_CODE = OS01.SUBJECT_CODE ) AA WHERE CASE WHEN TCNT <= 3 AND (CNT1+CNT2) < TCNT AND CNT3 = 0 THEN 0 WHEN CNT1 > 0 AND CNT2 > 0 THEN 0 WHEN CNT30 > 1 OR CNT31> 1 OR CNT32 > 1 OR CNT33 > 1 OR CNT34 > 1 THEN 0 WHEN CNT30 > 0 AND (CNT31+CNT32+CNT33+CNT34) > 0 THEN 0 WHEN CNT31 = 0 AND CNT32 > 0 AND (CNT33+CNT34) > 0 AND (CNT1+CNT2) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN (CNT31+CNT32+CNT33) >= 3 OR (CNT31+CNT32+CNT34) >= 3 OR (CNT32+CNT33+CNT34) >= 3 THEN 0 WHEN CNT3 > 0 AND (CNT1+CNT2) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END = 1 ) AS CHK_CNT8 FROM PCPS01TB WHERE FK_BSNS_CLS = #bsnsCls# AND FK_RCIV_DATE = #rcivDate# AND FK_RCIV_SEQ_NUM = #rcivSeqNum# AND FK_PTY_ID = #piboPtyId# AND DAM_CLS = '10' AND PROC_CLS = 'A0' AND PRE_INFO_CLS = 'PR001'
OPTIMIZE FOR 1 ROW WITH UR

SELECT FK_PTY_ID , SEQ_NUM , INFO_TYPE , INFO_CD , DATATYPE_CLS , INFO_VAL_TEXT , INFO_VAL_NUM , INFO_VAL_DATE FROM ( SELECT FK_PTY_ID , SEQ_NUM , RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY INFO_TYPE, INFO_CD ORDER BY SEQ_NUM DESC ) RANK , INFO_TYPE , INFO_CD , DATATYPE_CLS , INFO_VAL_TEXT , INFO_VAL_NUM , INFO_VAL_DATE FROM GCCE37TB WHERE FK_PTY_ID = #ptyId# AND APPL_END_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND INFO_TYPE IN ('GA001','GA002') ) AS CE01 WHERE RANK = 1 OPTIMIZE FOR 1 ROW FOR READ ONLY WITH UR

UPDATE PCCA00TB AA SET (FNL_ALLOC_NUM, FNL_ALLOC_NM, FNL_ALLOC_UNIT)= (SELECT CASE WHEN BB.CLERK_NO = BB.MAX_CLERK THEN '' ELSE BB.CLERK_NO END ,CASE WHEN BB.CLERK_NO = BB.MAX_CLERK THEN '' ELSE BB.CLERK_NAME END ,CASE WHEN AA.FNL_ALLOC_UNIT = 0 THEN 1 WHEN AA.FNL_ALLOC_UNIT > BB.MAX_UNIT THEN 1 WHEN AA.FNL_ALLOC_UNIT = BB.MAX_UNIT AND BB.CLERK_NO = BB.MAX_CLERK THEN 1 WHEN AA.FNL_ALLOC_UNIT < BB.MAX_UNIT AND BB.CLERK_NO = BB.MAX_CLERK THEN AA.FNL_ALLOC_UNIT + 1 ELSE AA.FNL_ALLOC_UNIT END FROM TABLE ( SELECT MAX(B.ALLOC_UNIT) MAX_UNIT ,MAX(CASE WHEN A.FNL_ALLOC_UNIT >= B.ALLOC_UNIT THEN B.CLERK_NO END) MAX_CLERK ,#clerkNo#||'' AS CLERK_NO ,#clerkName#||'' AS CLERK_NAME FROM PCCA00TB A ,PCCA01TB B ,STAFF0TB C WHERE A.DEPT_CD = #deptCode# AND A.PART_CD = #partCode# AND B.ABCD = CURRENT_DATE AND A.END_DATE = '9999-12-31' AND A.DEPT_CD = B.FK_DEPT_CD AND A.PART_CD = B.FK_PART_CD AND B.ALLOC_UNIT > 0 AND B.CLERK_NO = C.CLERK_NO AND C.RT_FRM_DATE = '9999-12-31' ) BB ) WHERE AA.DEPT_CD = #deptCode# AND AA.PART_CD = #partCode# AND AA.END_DATE = '9999-12-31'

INSERT INTO PCRV13TB ( FK_BSNS_CLS, FK_RCV_YEAR, FK_RCV_SEQ_NUM, PROC_CLS, SEQ_NUM, LGL_PROC_CONTS, BOND_SECURE_CLS, INPUT_CLERK_NO, INPUT_DATE, INPUT_TIME, APPL_START_DATE, APPL_END_DATE ) VALUES ( #bsnsCls#, #rcvYear#, #rcvSeqNum#, #procCls#, #seqNum#, #lglProcConts#, #bondSecureCls#, #inputClerk#, CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_TIME, CURRENT_DATE, '9999-12-31' )
SELECT 'ＯＫ' FROM ABCD342
